title: 2026–2030 Financial Plan Bylaw
description:
Council received a presentation on the City's five-year financial plan covering 2026 through 2030. The plan outlines operating and capital budget projections, including infrastructure renewal, service levels, and proposed property tax changes.

Actions: Council gave first, second and third reading to 2026–2030 Financial Plan Bylaw No. 3211, 2026.
decision: Council gave first, second and third reading to 2026–2030 Financial Plan Bylaw No. 3211, 2026.
